description.value: CodeSystem with standard values for the NUM-RDP data-transfer processes

definition.value: Patient used in the data export process
Pseudonym used in the data export process
Reference to an encrypted dataset or result bundle
Date parameter to filter resources last modified starting (inclusiv) at the specified date
Date parameter to filter resources last modified until (exclusive) the specified date
Boolean parameter to instruct the data-send process to abort after validating the generated transfer bundle but before transferring data to DTS/CRR
String parameter to instruct the receive Process where to store the data
Output parameter describing the encrypted transfer bundle size in byte
Output parameter documenting if the local validation was sucessful
Output parameter describing the number of resources included in the encrypted transfer bundle
